summary: 1999 CHEVY SILVERADO PICKUP   ABS  BRAKE PROBLEM  EBCM MODULE WENT OUT ON TRUCK AT 33,600 MILES.   THIS MODULE CONTINUES TO RUN  AFTER SHUTTING OFF YOUR TRUCK.  DRAINS BATTERY.   SKIDS FROM DRY TO WET PAVMENT.  HAD TO REPLACE ON SATURDAY EMERGENCY PULL OVER.   COST 914.85   I HAVE THE MODULE THAT WAS TAKEN OFF TRUCK FOR VERIFICATION.
